items.summary: Laura Slater // Galaxy // Single Hop IPA
items.desc:
7% ABV // 7 EBC // 20 IBU // 1.074 OG // 440ML
INGREDIENTS: Malted BARLEY (GLUTEN), OATS (GLUTEN), Maltodextrin, Hops, Yeast
For the fourth beer in our single hop series with Laura Slater, we return to the southern hemisphere. With this comes a flip in the seasons, the Australian harvest occurs around march, and these fresh hops arrive on UK shores at the end of our summer.
The most heralded of the Australian varieties, Galaxy, is also one of the hardest varieties for a brewer to get hold of, even more frustrating given what a fantastic aroma hop it is. This year we’ve had some success, so leapt at the chance to give it the single-hop treatment.
As you’d expect, we’ve utilised Galaxy at every stage of the hopping process, whirlpooling with 5g/l in a wort packed with the high portions of oats and wheat that’s come to be expected of the NE IPA style. For dry hopping we upped the rate to a heady 25g/l, to really take advantage of the rich oil content that large Galaxy hop cones deliver. The result is an IPA leading with big passion fruit and peach aromas which carry on to the palate, backed up with juicy mango, some citrus, and hints of grass and fern on the finish.

items.name: Enter The Haze
items.desc:
The humble IPA has been on an incredible journey. With it’s origins in England the style quickly took over the world. Initial American attempts to re-create this classic British style with big, bold US hops led the first West Coast IPA’s, over the last decade we’ve seen the style evolve again. Here we combine higher dry hopping with a water profile and yeast that gives stone and tropical fruit flavor and a hazier appearance to the beer. This is one of our favourite styles of beer and we’re proud to have championed it over the years.
Cases contain:
4 x FAITH
4 X STRIDING EDGE
4 X HEATHEN
All for £32!

items.name: Ofs016
items.desc:
8.7% ABV // 1.080 OG // 10 EBC // 40 IBU // 440ML
INGREDIENTS: Water, Malted BARLEY (GLUTEN), Malted WHEAT (GLUTEN), OATS (GLUTEN), Malted RYE (GLUTEN), Hops, Yeast
Inspired by the latest advances in hop delivery in the form of Incognito, we decided to see what it could do in an old school West Coast Double IPA. The Incognito allowed us to hot side hop at the equivalent of 10g/l, packing the liquid with silky, resinous hop oils. We then dry-hopped with Simcoe, Ekuanot and Mosaic which bring citrus, herbal and piney notes before a long yet smooth bitterness.

items.name: Ofs018
items.desc:
ABV 3.5% // 6.00 EBC // 10 IBU // 1.033 OG // 440ML
INGREDIENTS: Water, Malted BARLEY (GLUTEN), Malted WHEAT (GLUTEN), OATS (GLUTEN), Hops, Yeast, Watermelon, Lime, Mint
A sour offering pure refreshment and showcasing a fruit that we've been wanting to explore for a while, watermelon. Over a wheat-led base, lime brings zesty acidity while the mint, a natural accompaniment in any context, provides an aromatic counter to the juicy flavours of the watermelon.
----
In 2014 we opened the doors to the Old Flax Store, a Grade II listed building that we found and renovated into the home of Northern Monk.
We grew significantly in the years to follow, but the Old Flax Store remains the heart of the operation. If you’ve ever visited us here, you’ll know that you can look through the ground floor window to see our original tanks still in operation. This is where we brew our smaller, more limited releases.
2020 marks the year that we launch a brand-new beer series, a series dedicated to the exploratory, small-batch nature of brewing at OFS. We’ve released beers exclusive to the Old Flax Store before, but we’ve given this series a whole new identity.
The Old Flax Store Special series will push the boundaries of our brewing, allowing us to be completely experimental in approach. Since these beers will be limited in quantity, we’ve restricted can sales to two per person, to ensure that as many people as possible have the opportunity to try them.
We don’t expect these beers to hang around for long, so be quick if a release catches your eye. Follow our social media channels to make sure that you don’t miss out on a launch.

items.name: Ofs021
items.desc:
3% ABV // 6 EBC // 18 IBU // 1.043 OG // 440ML

items.name: Patrons Society Exclusive
items.desc:
ABV: 7.0% ABV
For this Patrons Society exclusive release, we’ve revisited some of our fruited IPA experiments from earlier in the year. Brewed with an IPA base and whirlpool hopped generously with Azacca, we added Seville and blood orange during fermentation for a tangy citrus lead. Finally, we conditioned on cinnamon and Madagascan vanilla for a rounding and complex spice character.

items.name: Pentrich
items.summary: Double Dry Hopped Dream Tempo // Imperial IPA
items.desc:
8.3% ABV
A special double dry hopped version of one of Pentrich’s recent favourites - where Citra is the star of the show. Huge citrus fruit aromas crawl out of the can upon opening; with masses of intense grapefruit & juicy stone fruit flavours hitting upon the first taste, and notes of dank pine and a firm bitterness on the finish.

items.name: Pentrich Brewing
items.desc:
7.2% ABV
A super hazy IPA packed full of three of Pentrich’s favourite hops. The Ekuanot adds layers of juicy tropical flavours alongside the punchy citrus notes from the Citra. Columbus supplies notes of resinous pine which, alongside the moderate bitterness, rounds out the fruity flavours.

items.name: Pipeline Brewing
items.desc:
6.0% ABV // 440ML
A smooth easy drinking IPA with passionfruit and watermelon on the nose. Flavour is fresh and clean with a vibrant melon feel, Fresh cut grass, and pine on the finish.

items.name: Super Stredge
items.desc:
0.5% ABV // 1.0185 OG // 5 EBC // 15 IBU // 440ML
INGREDIENTS: Water, Malted BARLEY (GLUTEN), OATS (GLUTEN), Maltodextrin, Hops, Yeast
We've been working behind the scenes on a low alcohol beer which delivers on all the flavour, silky mouthfeel, tropical fruit and piney finish that we love about Striding Edge and Faith, but at 0.5% ABV. After trials at out refectory sites, we've tweaked and upscaled and are proud to release super stredge out to a wider audience.

items.name: Transient
items.desc:
7.4% ABV // 440ML
INGREDIENTS: Water, Malted BARLEY (GLUTEN), OATS (GLUTEN), WHEAT (GLUTEN), Hops, Yeast
A new addition to our regular range, Transient is the first core beer in the UK to showcases Strata as its lead hop. Brewed with Incognito hop oils in the whirlpool and then dry hopped to 20g/l, with Strata backed up with the ever popular tropical flavours of Citra, this is IPA is a haze of passion fruit, orange zest, mango and dank pine.

items.name: Valour
items.desc:
ABV 10.50% // 440ML
INGREDIENTS: Water, Malted BARLEY (GLUTEN), OATS (GLUTEN), WHEAT (GLUTEN), Hops, Dextrose, Yeast
Rich in body and flavour, hopped to imperial IPA levels but with a complex barley malt grist. Brewed with the finest barley malt, plenty of flaked oats, malted wheat, and pale crystal malts for a sticky and silky mouthfeel with bready and caramel notes. We hopped generously with headline US varieties Citra, Simcoe, Ekuanot, and Mosaic for tropical fruit notes underpinning prominent dank pine, pithy citrus, and hints of red berry fruits.

items.name: Yonder
items.desc:
4.0% // 440ML
This Gose-style beer was brewed with juiced, UK grown carrots, Cornish sea salt, coriander seed and fermented with Yonder's house cultures. Orange in colour and with a gentle acidity against the sweet and savoury flavour of carrot, it is a wonderfully refreshing alternative version of the classic German sour beer style.
